name: Madelyn Craig
text: This was a great location! Our food was ready to go when we arrived for pick up and it was HOT! The service was friendly and the food was delicious. Definitely a great place to go to!

text: Absolutely the worst. First we were delivered the wrong pizza, then the hot wings were sent RAW!! This location is absolutely terrible. One bad experience after the next. Today was the last straw we will no longer be ordering from any pizza hut.

text: Terrible service. The food was gross. Pizza was drenched in sauce and topped with hardly any cheese. The amount of bacon they put on my pizza was a joke and mostly halfcooked chunks of fat. Crust was white and dry as a cracker on a pan …More

name: K H
text: Pizza hut disc. the P'zone like 2014. Local stores have still made it and it was able to be ordered until mid 2018. I called today and they made me one - wasn't 100% exact - but was still a great P'zone.  Hope they bring it back.

name: Allyson Gurczynski
text: I ordered a pizza and garlic knots today at 7:25 pm and it Is now 9pm and I'm still waiting for the delivery guy.  This is rediculous; i just want the food i paid for. Unacceptable service.

text: Made it in twenty minutes and had great flavor. Pizza hut has come along ways. Will be doing more business with them!
